===Etymology===
Note that Japanese uses a variant form of the left radical {{m|mul|食||food|sc=Hani}} (two horizontal lines at the bottom) – the character, being {{w|hyōgaiji}} (uncommon), is written in [[kyūjitai]] (Japanese traditional forms).
